# Epoch AI Notable AI Models

## Source
- **URL**: https://epochai.org/data/notable-ai-models
- **License**: CC BY 4.0
- **Date Accessed**: 2026-01-26

## Description
Dataset of notable AI models including parameters, training compute, and other characteristics. Used for the AI inference compute vs brain emulation requirements figure.

## File
- `notable-ai-models.csv` - Full dataset from Epoch AI

## Attribution
When using this data, credit as:
```
Data: Epoch AI (epochai.org)
```

## Update Instructions
1. Download latest CSV from https://epochai.org/data/notable-ai-models
2. Replace `notable-ai-models.csv`
3. Update "Date Accessed" in this README
4. Regenerate figures: `python3 figures/run_all_figures.py compute-hardware-trends-brain-emulation`
